## Verify.add property

An account adds their own verification evidence. Internally `msg.sender` is used; delegated `add` is not supported.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly add: (data: BytesLike, overrides?: TxOverrides) => Promise<ContractTransaction>;
```
